statement.p: In 34.78 of the last 23 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{23}}={0.3478}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{23}. \displaystyle{P}={0.3478}\cdot{23}={7.9994}. We round that as requested to 8 to find the days it rained. How many days did it NOT rain?
